Amazing food and great customer service.

Review Text: We‚Äòve been to the Restaurant spontaneous on an early saturday evening. Later it was fully booked, so it might be a good idea to reserve a table. ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Very happy to have found this new little gem next door! Interesting vegan flavours, super friendly atmosphere, beautiful multicultural interior!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: You don't need to be a vegan to enjoy the food but you'll definitely consider it leaving Hearth. The stuff was very friendly and welcoming, the cocktails and music were great and the food was delicious. Must try the beet ravioli. Will be coming back!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Such a wonderful a plant-based sofisticated restaurant, with cozy environment and nice service. Don't miss the black ravi√≥lis!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: The service is fantastic. The owner is very friendly and clearly passionate about the food.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Easily one of the best vegan food restaurants in Amsterdam is back in a new location! üòä

Name: Hearth
Review Text: We had the most amazing dinner at Hearth! The food was A-MA-ZING. The staff was so friendly, the atmosphere was great and to top it off the music fit the vibe so perfectly. Had my birthday dinner here and felt so at home. Loved it & will definitely be back ASAPüíú

Name: Hearth
Review Text:
Excellent food, even the meat eaters loved it and Marco & co couldn't do enough for us.
They organised a table for 7 people at late notice, took particularly great care ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Wonderful service! The whole staff was friendly and attentive to our special requests and concerns! The food was delicious and very pretty. Thank you for a nice dinner for our group. üòä

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Great service, cozy location, chill music & delicious food (try that sushi!). We'll be back, happy to have such a great vegan place in Oost! :)

Name: Hearth
Review Text:
Loved the food!

Most of the dishes are vegan! I think only 3 out of the whole menu are ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Hearth is an absolutely fantastic vegetarian/vegan restaurant. I loved my dinner so much, I immediately had to return for lunch the following day. ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: A chill place to spend a cozy afternoon. The swing inside the restaurant is so cool. The sushi looks elegant and is made with healthy ingredients.. The gnocchi is a must try, taste so fresh. The cashew cream and the pasta sauce are so ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Really friendly service from passionate owner and chefs. They really make you feel looked after. The atmosphere is super cozy with a great variety of seating options. We had the red sushi to start, a large lentil and potato soup, the ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Found this place online looking for a vegan/vegetarian place to eat around Albert Cuyp Market, in Amsterdam. More than a restaurant this place is a concept store. As you walk in, it gives the impression of being just a shop, but once you ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Amazing Food and Atmosphere! Staff and Owners are very friendly, thank you for a great evening! :)

Name: Hearth
Review Text: We totally loved this place. Very friendly and passionate staff and the food - omg! We've been to fair share of vegan restaurants in North America, but you can taste the passion and attention to detail here. ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic. So much thought into every dish. I highly recommend all the pastas. ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: This place is a little oasis on the Albert Cuyp. A little hidden but just amazing. Food is simply Delicious and the service so nice, friendly, warm & professional. I would recommend this place for anyone that wants great healthy ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Food was delicious, portions are quite small for the prices. Staff is very friendly and the atmosphere cozy and warm.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Fantastic Food. Super caring and incredible Staff Including the owner. I go and have vegan dinners from time to time, but that was definitely one of the best places ever! And you wouldn‚Äôt guess it‚Äôs vegan! Yummy

Review Text: Great vibe, beautiful ambience and super friendly staff. Concept store and restaurant with delicious vegan food in a fusion of Asian and Mediterranean flavours. ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Love the place. Really pleasant, relaxed, very friendly and quite delicious. There is something very soothing in the atmosphere here, feels homey. We had the tagliatelle with pesto, the qinoua avocado sushi and two soups - grilled aubergine soup, and the colliflower soup. I loved all of them.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Heartwarming and delightful. We ordered the broccoli gnocchi, sandwich, and red sushi. The chef really enhanced the natural flavors of the ingredients in all the dishes. I especially loved the nuttiness of the sandwich, with a perfect ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Awesome place for Vegans. Priced nominally. Very much reachable but beware it is in one of the busiest streets in Amsterdam (Albert Cuyp Straat - famous street market in Amsterdam). It is hidden behind the street shops during the day and ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Truly loved the whole set up and concept of this place and the swings are definitely an experience in themselves. The vegan Sushi starter with black quinoa is amazing to look at and delicious to the point of wanting to order another ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: It was AMAZING!!! Great Interieur and the food is absolutely delicious. From simple pasta to rawioli and especially the limoncello dessert was a great experience for the mouth. We will come back on our next trip to amsterdam. Totally worth it!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Absolute perfection! Really friendly, warm owners who were super attentive and genuine.  Delicious food!! Earthy, bohemian ambiance with eclectic decor. Truly haute cuisine at bistro prices. Couldn't have had a more special last meal during our visit to Netherlands.

Name: Hearth
Review Text:
Simple people with a big heart.  Nice atmosphere where you can warm your soul and your body..
A place where you will not find violence on your plate, but only love for ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text:
Outstanding food and friendly service in this mostly vegan place. We had the sushi as a starter and then three types of freshly made pasta. Some classic Italian, some with a twist and some very foreign during different cuisines together.
Oh and it's also an organic/ fair trade shop in case you want to buy a present üòÅ

Name: Hearth
Review Text: This place is amazing! Definitely a must go in Amsterdam. The sushi is really different than any other sushi we tasted, with a superior quality and flavor. Also recommend the falafel waffle. The service is excellent, waiters and cook very politeand friendly. I plan to  come back often.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Such a warm environment, staff and interior! Deliciously made and presented food! Recommend the tagliatelle & coconut tiramisu! Definitely going back :)

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Delicious vegan food! Flavours are so good. We had the pesto tagliatelle & falafel waffles for main both excellent but we eat too quickly to picture!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Loved falafel waffle... Unique and tasty..Classis tiramisu made sure we felt sumptuous at the end... Tried Zucchini boat..nice idea.. personally not a fan of vinegar dressing..so for me it was fine

Name: Hearth
Review Text: As a non-trendy, non-vegetarian and sometimes picky Italian eater I was unsure about what to expect. Luckily the unpretentious ambience and Marco‚Äôs unobtrusive attention conquered me over and convinced me to try the food ‚Äì until then I was ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Excellent food and great service. The wine was vegan as well and also delicious. Creative dishes in a quaint little shop that also sells candles and other things. Some of the best vegan food I've ever had!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Lovely little place with a nice atmosphere. The staff are super friendly too. I ate the vegan sushi, which was delicious and for main we shared the ravioli and tagliatelle and both were super tasty. Don‚Äôt knock vegan food until you‚Äôve tried ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Just amazing. Best food I‚Äôve ever had. Everybody is so friendly and happy. Very cozy and warm place, nice music and atmosphere. Very suitable prices for what you get. Our new favourite restaurant!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Really enjoyed the whole experience. It's a 90% vegan menu. Tagliatelli were amazing, as well as the sushi. Service was good, they paid attention to detail and were relaxed.

Name: Hearth
Review Text:
Great place to be with amazing energy .
Outstanding interior design and just incredible food .
I advice it to anyone !

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Wonderful place for vegetarian and vegan lovers or anyone else. The atmosphere is relaxed, staff is very friendly and the food is amazing. Of this restaurant was closer to where I live, I'd probably eat here every week. ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Had a pleasant Sunday meal over here. The service is good and the dishes were tasty. Had the zucchini boats with marinated spelt which were both nutritious and yummy and a good vegan tiramisu. Recommended for a quiet(er) moment in De Pijp!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Had an amazing time here. The seating and decor is so comfortable and cozy it gives an atmosphere of eating at a friend‚Äôs house. The menu is 95% vegan. Lovely staff. We were really charmed by the swing seats and plants. We ordered a round of soups, pasta, and deserts. All around a wholesome experience.

Name: Hearth
Review Text:
Great place, amazing food, the staff make you feel at home!
This is Hospitality!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Nice place, very peaceful. The meals are so good ! Thank you for the warm welcome, the tiramisu ans the soups üòâ

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Super gorgeous food, great ambience, lovely music and friendly staff. Best recommendation ever!

Review Text:

Name: Hearth

Review Text: Five stars all the way. From the moment we walked until we left the service and people were just so hospitable. Our waitress and her helpers were all top notch.  In addition to the yummy steaks, always the best, the salad was tasty. The sides were all excellent. Overall this restaurant is best in BTR.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Fantastic place. For a vegan place, the prices aren't expensive and the food is really great. We will definitively come back next time üëç

Review Text: One of the best vegetarian meals I've ever eaten. We ate the beet ravioli and the falafel waffle -- both had great ingredients and were cooked perfectly! The prices are reasonable, so you can and should stay for dessert.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: I am a plant based eater, hungry at the time I was wondering around the Albert Cuypstraat market.. My instincts guided me straight to the inconspicuous doors of H/Earth üåç. Menu was enticing.. Walked into a subtle lit space, soft music and ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Amazing encounter of italian tradition and veggie trends. Nice staff (specially Giorgia from Italy) and well worked menu. Prices above the average, but worthy. Amazing experience. Amazing decoration. Better to make a reservation in advance.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Best best vegan place in town!!! Super tasty, good prices, incredible friendly staff and cozy environment. ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Wonderful service by very kind and enthusiastic staff, delicious food and very good vibes all around. Would totally come back and encourage everybody to try. The red sushi was very tasty, and their tiramisus were also great.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: This quirky and wonderful restaurant is one of the best finds in Amsterdam. Even if you are not vegan or vegetarian you will LOVE the food. The flavors are extraordinary and the presentation extremely friendly. The owners are great examples ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Delicious food with great friendly staff! We ordered the vegan sushi and avocado gnocchi with vegan tiramisu to finish. The food was delicious. The portions are small however - so order an extra main or sides to share if you are hungry.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: It's one of the most amazing and cozy place I've ever been. Being greeted with a big smile, the second you step through the door is wonderful. ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Really delicious and beautifully presented food, excellent service and cozy atmosphere. They also regularly host live music performances which I loved. Only point for improvement I can think of is that the portions are a little bit on the small side, so when in doubt order a starter.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Every time I travel, I try to find a local vegan place to try it out! My husband and I were in De Pijp district and we found this hidden gem! Right away, the hostess was so kind and accommodating to find us seating even when we didn‚Äôt have ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Nice place to chill, enjoy good food made with love, surrounded by street art :)

Name: Hearth
Review Text: I enjoyed the innovative vegan cuisine. The bean soup was delightful. The Japanese inspired wasabi ravioli were interesting, the dough was a bit thick and heavy. The atmosphere is charming, with a old school homey feel, and one table that has swings for chairs.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Wonderfully friendly & charming Italian cooks! The vegan tiramisu was so cloudy and sweet, truly an enjoyment. It's a comfortable place to lounge in and maybe read a magazine as you munch on one of the tasty meals!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Tasty little vegan restaurant, very friendly and helpful staff. The fresh pasta is amazing, we had tagliatelle and Japan flags. Nice selection of soups, smoothies and vegetarian desserts also. Highly recommended.

Name: Hearth
Review Text:
(In English to reach most people)

Hearth has a very modern creative interior with a warm almost living room ‚Ä¶

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Best plant-based restaurant I've ever tried so far! Outstanding service, incredible vegan food and wines and a great location (close from the city center). A must-try if you are in Amsterdam. Reserving a table before showing up is not a bad idea, though. H/eart.h is quite popular among the locals!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Me and my girlfriend had a great experience at Hearth! The staff is very friendly and Marco took some time to explaine us the concept of the restaurant and the dishes in the menu. Really appreciate that! Food is tasty and the atmosphere is friendly. Totally recommended if you are vegan or vegetarian!

Name: Hearth
Review Text:
Definitely one of the best  vegan places in Amsterdam, probably The best.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: This was a fantastic intimate location and experience. You can tell they put a lot of thought, love, and pride into their food, presentation, and service. Absolutely world class vegetarian/vegan food, some of the best I have ever had.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: We ate at night in this vegan restaurant slightly out of the living area. At 19h without reservation, there were only 2 places! Review Text: Nice place.... Good portions... Fast service. We all liked what We got. Service was almost overwhelming.. üòÇ

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Food and service were both more than amazing! I would definitely recommend the vegan sushi and thee coconut white chocolate tiramisu! Such a cozy little place - a must go for anyone who loves FOOD!

Name: Hearth

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Delicious food and wonderful service! Sweet potato soup was delightful and the zucchini boat was very tasty! Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Amsterdam! Thank you very much!

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Love the food and drinks! Great atmosphere, besides food they have cool art, clothing and accessoires for sale. My favourite place to go to! Also my non-vegan friends love the place, def a hidden gem on the Albert Cuyp market.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: A very unique place to eat. The decor is phenomenal, atmosphere is tranquil. Came during a live jazz meet up. Best experience I had visiting Amsterdam.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: I had the best meal in Amsterdam at Hearth and I'm not even vegan. Everything is made with passion, their selection of soups and pastas is everything you feel like eating during the cold Amsterdam winter. I recommend the curry coconut soup for hangovers and any of the fresh-and-delicious pastas. Sushi and tiramisu are also guaranteed.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: We are not vegan but we have been absolutely amazed by the food and the passion these guys put in what they do.The sushi was incredible and the flavours of the pasta combinations were surprisingly tasty.

Name: Hearth
Review Text: Super cozy and idiosyncratic italo-vegan restaurant, opened in early 2017.  Everything is good, fresh, and delicioso!  Very friendly staff/owners who make you laugh and dispell all possibility of hunger. The swing seats are worth a try...

Name: Hearth
